products.title: Rochana Voile Antique Gold Roman Blind
products.description: If you're looking for a classy (dare we say opulent?) way to dress your windows, without sacrificing either your daytime privacy or the light, then you've found it right here. products.title: Crushed Velvet Antique Gold Roman Blind
products.description: Does anything speak of luxury better than the colour gold? Its classic, its fashionable and it screams opulence. products.title: Damocles Antique Gold Roman Blind
products.description: This damocles antique gold roman blind is a stunning mashup of themes and tones that make it at once refined, opulent and cosy.
